title: Haider
writer: William Shakespeare, Basharat Peer, Vishal Bhardwaj
short_cast: Shahid Kapoor, Tabu, Shraddha Kapoor, Kay Kay Menon, Irrfan Khan, Narendra Jha, Lalit Parimoo, Aamir Bashir
cast: Shahid Kapoor, Tabu, Shraddha Kapoor, Kay Kay Menon, Irrfan Khan, Narendra Jha, Lalit Parimoo, Aamir Bashir
genre: Movies based on a Play, Social Issue Dramas, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Crime Movies, Dramas
desc: Epic betrayals, existential crises and an Oedipal complex pave a young man’s turbulent path to avenge his father’s death in a conflict-torn Kashmir.
